reviews.review_text: We've enjoyed a wonderful afternoon drinking beers eating chips and soaking up the sun. The staff couldn't do enough for us

The service is not good. We ordered one thing and they brought something else out and charged us for it. Then said we donâ€™t have the item we ordered. This is coming from a person that speaks the language and lives in California. Would not recommend. Hit up the other shacks.

The shacks ambience is good. But the food is not that good. Also, the serving men were rude and never felt like they want to serve us. Even harsh is saying food is not available. Overall bad experience when compared to my experience in other shacks in goa.
